concept.display: breastfed how many times in 24 hours?

designation.value: Number of times the client is breastfed in 24 hours
Based on the number of feeds during a 24 hour period the result is auto-calculated to determine sufficient feeds
Based on the number of feeds during 24 hour period the result is auto-calculated to determine insufficient feeds

concept.display: young infant receives food or fluids other than breast milk

designation.value: The client is receiving other food or drinks besides breastmilk

concept.display: what milk is being given as a replacement feed?

designation.value: The health care worker discusses the milk being given to the client as a replacement feed and determines if it is appropriate replacement milk

concept.display: how many replacement feeds during the day and night (24 hours)?

designation.value: How often the client is receiving replacement feeds during the day and night (24 hours)
Based on the number of feeds during the day and night (24 hours) the result is auto-calculated to determine sufficient replacement feeds
Based on the number of feeds during the day and night (24 hours) the result is auto-calculated to determine insufficient replacement feeds

designation.value: The amount of milk given to the client at each feed
